title: In between
creator_credit: Chris Warner, Mandy Smith and Kim Dalton
brief_description: A mini series of four one-hour episodes, each of which concentrates primarly on one of the four major characters (Fatima, Saret, Angie and Alex) but also, advances the stories of three other characters. We learn of their relationships with friends and neighbours,their families and their workplaces.
